message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.MA, cs.AI 

This paper deals with multi-armed bandit methods applied to online advertising and product recommendation, which are typically studied in the machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories. The paper also discusses algorithms based on the UCB and KLUCB frameworks, which are commonly used in the field of multi-armed bandits (cs.MA). Additionally, the paper proposes a Poissonization argument that may be of independent interest in other settings, which suggests a connection to the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of delayed conversions, which may involve statistical modeling and analysis (cs.DS).
